mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SEL_ITEM S FULL OUTER JOIN FILE_UPLOAD ON S.SEL_ID = FILE_BID ORDER BY SEL_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM SEL_ITEM S FULL OUTER JOIN FILE_UPLOAD ON S.SEL_ID = FILE_BID WHERE SEL_FIELD = #{selectData} ORDER BY SEL_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEL_ITEM(SEL_ID, SEL_NAME, SEL_FIELD, SEL_LOCATION, SEL_TITLE, SEL_CONTENT, SEL_PRICE) VALUES (SEL_ITEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sel_name}, #{sel_field}, #{sel_location}, #{sel_title}, #{sel_content}, #{sel_price})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SEL_ITEM S FULL OUTER JOIN FILE_UPLOAD ON S.SEL_ID = FILE_BID WHERE (SEL_FIELD LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR SEL_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR SEL_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%') ORDER BY SEL_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM SEL_ITEM S FULL OUTER JOIN FILE_UPLOAD ON S.SEL_ID = FILE_BID WHERE SEL_ID = #{sel_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE SEL_ITEM SET SEL_NUMBER = SEL_NUMBER + 1 WHERE SEL_ID = #{itemid}
UPDATE SEL_ITEM SET SEL_VIEW = SEL_VIEW + 1 WHERE SEL_ID = #{sel_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_NUMBER, REVIEW_ITEMNUMBER, REVIEW_STARCOUNT, REVIEW_WRITER, REVIEW_CONTENT) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{review_itemNumber}, #{review_starCount}, #{review_writer}, #{review_content})
